author: Andrew Miller
title: Space constraints could hamper Indian players' training - John Gloster
description: The Rajasthan Royals physio urges players to focus on mental training to overcome challenges of COVID-19 lockdown | ESPNcricinfo.com
content: The COVID-19 lockdown could provide a new generation of cricketers the time and space required to hone the mental side of their game, according to John Gloster, the Rajasthan Royals' physiotherapist. He believes that some lasting benefits could yet arise from… [+6166 chars]
